short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights all upper-cased text sections of the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually highlight parts of the page that are all UPPER CASE text. This is useful as a design tool for getting a sense of the visual weight of various parts of the page.
